resources.string: Xposed module optimized for extensions to ColorOS\nDeveloper: luckyzyx
Automatically check for updates when opening the module home page
Allow built-in tiles to start automatically

When the host-side module version number is consistent with the local module version number,and enable this function,The function of opened tiles will be automatically triggered after the screen is unlocked.If the trigger fails,please restart the scope and check Root permissions
You need to read and agree to the following content before you can use this module
Clear all function data in the module
Make sure you want to clear all the function data of the module, and you need to reset the function after clearing?

1.The module calling method will open a new page of the module and trigger the self-starting function,This method may cause the screen to be untouchable for a few seconds when it is unlocked\n2.The system ui calling method will call the self-starting function on the process of the system ui,Need to give root permission to the system ui,Otherwise, the autostart cannot be triggered
LSPosed must be turned off to force desktop icons
Be sure to note your nickname or ID when donating
Your donation will be the driving force for the module update
Click to view the open source list
Go to Crowdin to contribute your translation
Module not activated detected.\nPlease use LSPosed %1$s and above to check the module scope.\nIf you have completed this step, you can try to click OK to exit and reopen the module.
Because the module only supports ColorOS 12 and above systems, please be sure to take security measures!
Root permission is not detected, some functions will not be available!
Are you sure you want to restart all scoped processes except the system framework?\nUse this if the module isn\'t working!\nMake sure all the relevant scopes are checked!
The official Color OS installer needs to enable other functions to use\nFunction List-Application Related-Application Installation Related
Allows the app to override older versions if new versions are installed.
Signature verification when installing apps can be installed.
Allows overriding directly installed apps with different signatures to the package
Always use the signed installed APP while installing
Is not a normal!danger! Only enable when absolutely needed
You can solve some internal integrity check within the app, which does not need to be enabled
!!! All packages can override installed App!!\nto install unknown packages
Double click statusbar to lock screen
Vibrate when opening the status bar
Remove the whitelist that scrolls to the top when the status bar is clicked
Remove the whitelist restriction that scrolls to the top when some apps click on the status bar
If it is 0, the font size will not be modified
Set status bar speed refresh rate 1 s
Set network speed double row spacing
Remove status bar developer option notifications
Remove status bar app upper level notifications
Remove status bar \"This app is displayed on top of other apps\"
Remove app high battery consumption warning
Removed the warning that the application\'s battery consumption is abnormal and needs to be optimized immediately
Remove Do Not Disturb Mode Notification
Remove personal hotspot power consumption notification
Notify: Turning on the personal hotspot for a long time will increase power consumption and heat
Remove the virus risk notification in Phone Manager
Allow long press notifications to be modifiable
Fill in the package name that needs to be added to the blacklist, each line can only fill in one package name
Hide SIM card no service icon
Hide icon when not connected to bluetooth
Remove status bar payment protection icons
Remove the green dot privacy prompt
Remove the green Wi-Fi hotspot icon
Return to the normal colon when it is turned on, and use the official custom colon when it is turned off
Remove control center clock red one
修复横屏日期农历显示
Fix the problem that the date cannot be displayed completely
Force the display of the media player
Restore page layout row count for edit tiles
Set control center search button mode
Remove the security warning message at the bottom of the control center
Remove security warning message and dialogs
After connecting to VPN, a message will be displayed at the bottom of the control center\nAfter installing the CA certificate, it shows that the network may be monitored
Restore some tile long press events
Restore WiFi, Bluetooth, personal hotspot and other tile long press events to open the corresponding page
Long press the WIFI tile to open the page
Long press the mobile data tile to open the page
Long press the WiFi hotspot tile to open the page
Long press the Bluetooth tile to open the page
Long press the screenshot tile to open the page
Long press the DND tile to open the page
Fix tile alignment on both sides
Fix the overflow of the layout on both sides when the tile is not expanded
Control center tile function main switch
If it is 0, the margin size will not be modified
Remove battery percentage number in statusbar
Display battery voltage and other information in the statusbar
When charging, the voltage and theoretical charging power of the charger will be displayed on the statusbar
Display the update time of the current data in the statusbar
Applicable only to models that do not support screen-off music
Lock screen clock red one mode
Apply to lock screen dual clock
Only for systems where the lock screen cannot be centered in the settings
Lockscreen clock components use user fonts
The button in the lower left corner of the lock screen is replaced with a flashlight
Switch the flashlight to automatically turn off the screen
Remove lock screen close notification button
Removed the SOS emergency button at the bottom of the unlock page
Removed the security restriction of not using a password to unlock within 72 hours after booting,Effective after system restart
Remove desktop clock component red one
Remove the desktop clock component Red One Enhanced Edition
Only available when the regular version does not take effect, otherwise it will cause an inevitable error
Remove the dot after APP update
Sets the maximum number of rows and columns supported by the desktop layout
Maximum number of lines in desktop layout
Long press the app icon to open the app details
Remove recent task list clear button
Remove the APP icon at the bottom of the recent task list
Fix the current task to the top
Set the number of icon columns in the folder
Since the splash screen animation has been removed, there will be a 1–2 second gap period when the APP is started.If you mind, please do not turn it on
Enable according to your needs, otherwise there will be irreparable problems
After the function is turned on, the original list of app clones will be replaced by this list, too many will cause lag
Need to be used with the core patch
Remove low/equivalent version of warnings, etc.
Can install different signed APPs, use the core breakup
Show package name and version code
Display the package name and version code at the top of the installation page
Use ADB to install APP without tapping
Unlocks the number of background tasks
Force all apps to support split screen
Remove blacklist of app uninstall button
Allow locking or unlocking of excluded activities
Do not show heads up again when copying text
Disable the warning dialog that appears when turning up the volume after connecting the headset
Remove warning dialogs for power save mode and super power save
Remove warning dialog that app displaying over the desktop
Warning dialog box found that an application displaying over the system desktop
The file transfer mode is selected by default after connecting the USB
Removed secure pay found virus dialog
Remove the black background of the side slider
The icon width is recommended to be around 100px
Replace the side slide icon on the left
Replace the side slide icon on the right
Remove fingerprint icon and press animation
The recommended image resolution is around 216 x 216
Categories with difficulty will be placed here
Valid only when connecting to charger
Disable OTG for more than ten minutes to automatically turn off
Remove the restriction that this folder cannot be used
Set to 0 to disable this function, restart the system to take effect
Minimum volume level can be zero
Open battery screen power saving entrance
Settings - Battery - More settings - Screen Power Saving
Mainly solve the frame drop problem when the screen is not touched (Note: This will also disable dynamic refresh rate for devices with hardware-level LTPO screens)
Set the volume bar display position
Force enable the systemui blur feature
Preconditions: You need to turn on the option to “force enable the blur feature of the systemui”\nFunctional location: Miscellaneous

Remove the limitation that various functions cannot be used,For example: camera, flashlight, hotspot, screen display engine, etc.\nThe theoretical camouflage temperature is 30°C, and the specific effect is not guaranteed.
If the APP is manually granted the `ignore battery optimization` permission by the user, After enabling this function, the APP will not be automatically added to the battery optimization whitelist
Do not use this feature when the system supports battery health\nThe accuracy of the data cannot be guaranteed
Enable some systems that do not support the option to modify the status bar clock format
After enabling, you can see more options in the settings
Forced to display low brightness and no flicker eye protection
There is no guarantee that it will work, it is only used to display function options
Forcibly display video MEMC interpolation frame
If your device does not support MEMC, please do not use this function
Enable screen color temperature RGB palette
May be overridden by DC function
After enabling the feature and restarting the scope,Open the developer options page and set the minimum width
Force to show Google at the bottom of the settings
Set the processor to click to jump to the page
Show package name in app details
Show last update time in app details
Enable long press to copy in app details
Click on the icon to open the store page
If your camera does not support Hasselblad custom watermark (white strip shape), please do not open it
Enabling this feature on some models may cause the photo to turn green
Remove Root Detection Limit for Game Filter
Unlock network acceleration, game filters, etc.\nPlease test the specific function by yourself
After enabling this feature and restarting the scope, \n can jump to it via the shortcut portal
Fill in the package name of the media player to be added,Each line can only fill in one APP
Mainly solves the problem of excessive temperature in X mode
Remove backup/restore limitations that cannot use mobile data
Unlock part of the feature and try it on your own
First screenshot may not take effect
Remove restrictions on privacy which cannot be intercepted. Disable FLAG_SECURE if this does not take effect
Resolve most APPs cannot capture, screen share, or record limits\nRequires LSPosed 1.8.6+
Remove the page limit for long screenshots
Only some scenarios are supported, please test the specific situation by yourself
After clicking, relevant operations will be performed automatically, please wait patiently for a few seconds

Current Status: [%1$s]
Try to use this feature if the OTA update prompts for validation failure or prompts for dm-verity
Do not ask why the feature is grayed out because the system has update validation enabled by default
When validation is turned off the OTA update fails, so when the feature is turned on it locks out this feature
When the new version is obtained, you can click to extract the OTA information
Note: AONService (com.aiunit.aon) needs to be installed, and the camera permission must be granted!
Fill in the package name that needs to be added to the whitelist, and only one package name can be filled in each line
Enable the volume keys to control the flashlight
Conflict with other dynamic refresh rate processes, such as “dpfs”
The self-start function will be triggered 1 s after the screen is unlocked\nOption 1 can only be restarted and restored, please turn off the self-start function when restoring
Please enable unknown app installation permission!
No FPS data, please check Root permission

e.g. System UI reconciliation tools, process management, engineering mode, etc.
The current system does not support!

Such as package name, content, etc
Automatically execute once after the function is turned on, thereafter will be automatically triggered after unlocking the screen

Remove weather page bottom information flow ads

By injecting JS into the page m.weathercn.com to achieve the effect of blocking ads, it is suitable for functions that require a browser, such as the weather of the past 15 days that you jump to through the weather app
